trans-unit.source: Related and linked resources in the tile gallery
trans-unit.target: Related and linked resources in the tile gallery

trans-unit.source: Learn about related and linked resources that are displayed in the tile gallery of the Azure preview portal.
trans-unit.target: Learn about related and linked resources that are displayed in the tile gallery of the Azure preview portal.

trans-unit.source: Related and linked resources in the tile gallery
trans-unit.target: Related and linked resources in the tile gallery

trans-unit.source: The tile gallery enables you to find tiles for a particular resource and drag them onto your current blade.
trans-unit.target: The tile gallery enables you to find tiles for a particular resource and drag them onto your current blade.

trans-unit.source: Using the tile gallery, you can create management views that span resources.
trans-unit.target: Using the tile gallery, you can create management views that span resources.

trans-unit.source: For any specified resource, the related resources include all of the resources that share the same
trans-unit.target: For any specified resource, the related resources include all of the resources that share the same

trans-unit.source: resource group as the resource, and any resources that link to or from the resource.
trans-unit.target: resource group as the resource, and any resources that link to or from the resource.

trans-unit.source: Linked resources in Azure Resource Manager
trans-unit.target: Linked resources in Azure Resource Manager

trans-unit.source: Linking is a feature of the Azure Resource Manager.
trans-unit.target: Linking is a feature of the Azure Resource Manager.

trans-unit.source: It enables you to declare relationships between
trans-unit.target: It enables you to declare relationships between

trans-unit.source: resources even if they do not reside in the same resource group.
trans-unit.target: resources even if they do not reside in the same resource group.

trans-unit.source: Linking has no impact on the runtime
trans-unit.target: Linking has no impact on the runtime

trans-unit.source: of your resources, no impact on billing, and no impact on role-based access.
trans-unit.target: of your resources, no impact on billing, and no impact on role-based access.

trans-unit.source: It's simply a mechanism you can
trans-unit.target: It's simply a mechanism you can

trans-unit.source: use to represent relationships so that tools like the tile gallery can provide a rich management
trans-unit.target: use to represent relationships so that tools like the tile gallery can provide a rich management

trans-unit.source: experience.
trans-unit.target: experience.

trans-unit.source: Your tools can inspect the links using the links API and provide custom relationship
trans-unit.target: Your tools can inspect the links using the links API and provide custom relationship

trans-unit.source: management experiences as well.
trans-unit.target: management experiences as well.

trans-unit.source: How do I link my resources?
trans-unit.target: How do I link my resources?

trans-unit.source: When you create resources through the portal or by deploying a template through Azure PowerShell or Azure CLI, links are
trans-unit.target: When you create resources through the portal or by deploying a template through Azure PowerShell or Azure CLI, links are

trans-unit.source: automatically created for some dependent resources.
trans-unit.target: automatically created for some dependent resources.

trans-unit.source: You can also programmatically link resources by using the
trans-unit.target: You can also programmatically link resources by using the

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Linked Resources REST API</linkText><title></title></link> or by declaring the relationships in the template.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Linked Resources REST API</linkText><title></title></link> or by declaring the relationships in the template.

trans-unit.source: For a complete discussion of working with linked resources, see <link><linkText>Linking resources in Azure Resource Manager</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For a complete discussion of working with linked resources, see <link><linkText>Linking resources in Azure Resource Manager</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: If you need an introduction to writing Azure Resource Manager templates, see <link><linkText>Authoring templates</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: If you need an introduction to writing Azure Resource Manager templates, see <link><linkText>Authoring templates</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: To dive into greater detail about creating links between resources, see <link><linkText>Linking resources in Azure Resource Manager</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: To dive into greater detail about creating links between resources, see <link><linkText>Linking resources in Azure Resource Manager</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: To understand more about working with resource groups through the preview portal, see <link><linkText>Using the Azure Preview Portal to manage your Azure resources</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: To understand more about working with resource groups through the preview portal, see <link><linkText>Using the Azure Preview Portal to manage your Azure resources</linkText><title></title></link>.
